content.question: What is the instantaneous rate of change at x=2 of the function f given by <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="f of x equals open parentheses x squared minus 2 close parentheses divided by open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGMbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaa dIhapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTiaaikdaa8aaba WdbiaadIhacqGHsislcaaIXaaaaaaa@4108@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> ?
